response.overview: This documentary is all about nationality, race, identity, trust, culture, and media contact between Taiwan and China, and the chaotic mind-changing of the author during the shooting. The team interviewed some young people who were born in the early 80’s, and conducted various questionnaires in order to find out how the new generation in Taiwan is thinking about this ambiguous political situation, and even how they think it should be solved. The most important and remaining question is about to be answered…or will it?
response.title: Sisyphus: Formosa
